description: Tommy got so many e-mails when he interviewed Phoenix that he knew he would have to bring him back on, and soon.This week, Tommy's back in front of the camera, and right next to Phoenix. The two undress, watching as some porn-starlet is getting banged on TV, which makes them both hard and ready to have some fun.Tommy hasn't convinced Phoenix to come over to the bi world...just yet. But Phoenix does love to jerk off, so he had no problem collecting some rent cash to shoot a load next too our favorite porn star Tommy.This scene doesn't disappoint, but delivers some very hot camera angles with, of course, the two studs, stroking off in all their glory.Enjoy!
title: Couch Jerking Evening
